ygData.subject: Re: About time
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, everyone running around as DE is pretty lame, since me and my wife only play evil races, I dont like it either. I do hate it for the large races
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, everyone running around as DE is pretty lame, since me and my wife
only play evil races, I dont like it either. I do hate it for the large
races because of the size thing... Hopefully they make up for this some
way.. Depending on 1 class for shrink just sucks..

Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 12:38 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] About time


> From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
> "Steven E. Phipps" wrote:
> >
> > From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>
> >
> > I think the change sucks, from the perspective of a large race. Many
> > dungeons are bugged, cant even walk into sola, get back down the stairs
in
> > unrest, etc. This change hurts the large races bad, and came way too
late,
> > atfer everyone and the brother done got it. Now large races are
dependent on
> > shamans to enter the dungeons. Sucks to depend on 1 class. Maybe they
will
> > throw out a shrink type item, course prob require getting a rare pop off
a
> > dragon or something. I also feel like all the real cool items are gone.
> > Manastones, guise, jboots, etc. On the older servers so many people
already
> > have these, and the ogrew that got there late will have to stand and
shout
> > will pay for shrink at the dungeon entrance, while other people just
click
> > on there mask. I am sure you smaller race shadowknights like the change
> > though.... Dont see why they waited 9 months to do it....
> >
>
> I'm a DESK, but ready to sign any petition for shrink potions available
> at potion shops at a reasonable price, and/or the inclusion of a
> clickable or wearable shrinking item.
>
> IMO, if size is the problem, there are better ways to fix it then
> turning into a DE. A wearable all/all ring of shrink (or at least
> BAR,TRL,OGR) would be an ideal solution, but lets just hope they don't
> make it nodrop and in Sol A =)
>
> Xilith
>
> > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
